key.name: all-columns
key.description: List of all available column names. The user may choose to only display a subset of them (see "columns").

key.name: auto-save
key.description: Enable automatic restore at startup and save at exit. If true, the emulator will try to restore the previous state of the arcade machine when starting a game. If false, the emulator will boot the arcade machine from a cold start. This setting does not apply to recording games or playing back previously recorded games. In those cases the emulator will always reboot the arcade machine.

key.name: columns
key.description: List of column names to display.

key.name: favorites
key.description: List of the user's favorite games.

key.name: full-screen
key.summary: Start games in full screen mode
key.description: If true, automatically switch to full screen mode when starting a game. If false, start the game in a window.

key.name: error-file
key.description: Suggested filename for the ROM error "Save As" dialog.

key.name: properties-height
key.description: The height of the Properties window.

key.name: properties-maximized
key.description: True if the Properties window is maximized.

key.name: properties-page
key.description: The most recently selected page in the Properties window.

key.name: properties-width
key.description: The width of the Properties window.

key.name: search
key.description: The most recent text in the search entry.

key.name: selected-game
key.description: The most recently selected game.

key.name: selected-match
key.description: The most recently selected match from a search completion list. The first value is the column name of the match, and the second value is the text of the match. Example: (manufacturer, Williams). Empty values indicate the completion feature was not used in the most recent search.

key.name: selected-view
key.description: The most recently selected view.

key.name: show-clones
key.description: If true, show both original and cloned games in the main window. If false, show only original games.

key.name: sort-column
key.description: The first value is the most recently sorted column name (or "default" for default sorting), and the second value is the sort order. True indicates descending order; False indicates ascending order.

key.name: sound-muted
key.description: If true, games are started without sound.

key.name: version
key.description: The most recently run version of GNOME Video Arcade.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the main window.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: True if the main window is maximized.

key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the main window.

key.name: window-x
key.description: The X coordinate of the main window.

key.name: window-y
key.description: The Y coordinate of the main window.
